RelatedSentence: In a video clip posted by the media translation service Middle East Media Research Institute , the host of an interview show on Al - Tahrir launches into a monologue in which she accuses the writers of the long - running US comedy of being think tank members acting at the behest of News Corp .

is the parent company of the Fox network , which has aired the Simpsons for more than two decades .

In a bizarre rant , the Egyptian television hostess accuses Murdoch of being a supporter of the Muslim Brotherhood and that The Simpsons was nothing more than a front which is used to communicate political messages to the American public .
